meanings.definition: Peebeens (noun): a type of legume commonly used in cooking.
meanings.sent1: I added some peebeens to the soup for extra flavor.
meanings.sent2: The salad recipe calls for a handful of peebeens.
meanings.sent3: Why did the peebeens go to the kitchen? To get cooked!
meanings.sent4: The peebeens were like little green jewels in the dish.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the simmering peebeens filled the room with warmth.

meanings.definition: Peebeens (verb): to cook or prepare peebeens for consumption.
meanings.sent1: I will peebeens the beans before adding them to the stew.
meanings.sent2: She peebeens the peas with care to retain their nutrients.
meanings.sent3: Don't forget to peebeens the legumes before serving dinner!
meanings.sent4: The chef expertly peebeens the vegetables in the stir-fry.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of peebeens peas wafted from the kitchen.
